article_text: A rare point of agreement in America’s polarized health care debate is that children should have access to medical care. That’s why Congress should act now to renew funding for the Children’s Health Insurance Program, known as CHIP.

article_summary:
A rare point of agreement in America’s polarized health care debate is that children should have access to medical care.
That’s why Congress should act now to renew funding for the Children’s Health Insurance Program, known as CHIP.
